summary: A woman is packing her belongings while standing next to a bed. She is wearing a denim outfit and sandals. The room appears to be a bedroom with a large bed and pillows. Text overlay on the video provides context about her situation, mentioning that she is packing because her spouse was brought to the USA unlawfully as a Dreamer at age 19, they got married in 2012, had a daughter in 2020, and he was denied his consulate appointment. He now lives in Mexico, and she travels down every 4-8 weeks to see him. The woman is seen moving around the room, possibly organizing items.
keywords: packing, spouse, Dreamer, USA, unlawful, marriage, daughter, consulate appointment, Mexico, travel
